title: Cannot start LoL on Mac
body: i want to download LoL on my macbook but when ever i try, it always says UserKernel has quit unexpectedly. I have tried to search around for an answer but nothing has helped me so far.

replies.body:
Are you downloading it as a package.dmg and launching it after placing it into applications ?

If so, what version of OSX are you running, plus system specs, so I can help further.

Sorry but with the information you have provided I can only ask more questions to help.

PS, Windows is more stable and efficient with games and most other intensive applications... might be worth a look into installing Windows 7 via bootcamp.
Yeah I downloaded the dmg and placed LoL it into the applications folder. My version of OSX is up to date. I have included a picture of my specs

>might be worth a look into installing Windows 7 via bootcamp.

but if you do that, wouldn't it not support the graphics hardware and hence have a terribly slow game-play?
Have you updated your Mac's OS to the most recent one, and tried redownloading the installer?
